title: Mark Cavendish Vows To Make Final Tour de France Sprint Count: ‘It’s Another Opportunity. We’ll Try to Win’
content:
Cavendish suffered through the Pyrénées to fight for one last win: 'It's the last time perhaps I do a sprint in the Tour de France.'

Read the full article at Mark Cavendish Vows To Make Final Tour de France Sprint Count: ‘It’s Another Opportunity. We’ll Try to Win’ on Velo.
author: ahood
